cu.explanation_en: Setting the MNC length to 10 exceeds the valid range (1-3), causing PLMN configuration errors and network registration failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PRACH msg1 FDM to 100 exceeds the valid range (0-3), leading to improper PRACH configuration and RACH failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PRACH msg1 FDM 設定為 100 超過有效範圍 (0-3)，導致 PRACH 配置不當，並造成 RACH 失敗。
